introductory_dialogues: Para comenzar la batalla, entra en ese agujero de allÃ­.
Dentro de la mazmorra, hay dos portales.
Uno azul para volver aquÃ­ y uno rojo para ir al siguiente nivel y continuar matando enemigos.
rare_dialogues: A veces me pregunto si el bosque estÃ¡ vivo.
Â¿Viste esa extraÃ±a criatura?
Azul = salida. Rojo = seguir luchando.
Â¿Has leÃ­do alguna vez las instrucciones en la parte inferior derecha de la pantalla?
El pepe.
A veces las balas rebotan en las armas de los orcos... no tiene nada que ver con un problema de colisiones ni nada por el estilo.
Â¿Alguna vez te has preguntado quÃ© hay mÃ¡s allÃ¡ de este bosque?
No todos los dÃ­as encuentras un aventurero en estos lugares solitarios.
Dicen que hay un antiguo hechizo escondido en estos... Nah, estoy bromeando. En este lugar, solo hay portales. Eso es todo.
El Ãºltimo tonto que vino aquÃ­ no sabÃ­a cÃ³mo usar el lanzacohetes.
Nunca subestimes el poder de una flor en el bosque; puede contener mÃ¡s magia de lo que imaginas.
Esto es una mala copia de cualquier roguelite que hayas jugado.
Espero que no estÃ©s esperando nada especial aquÃ­. Lo Ãºnico que encontrarÃ¡s es una pÃ©rdida de tiempo.
Â¡Un valiente aventurero! O solo otro idiota que terminarÃ¡ muerto, derribado por duendes en lo profundo de la mazmorra
A veces, cuando el viento sopla justo, puedes oÃ­r... absolutamente nada. Â¡El sonido de fondo deberÃ­a mejorarse!
Â¡Tres armas son suficientes!
Cambia de armas presionando LB en el mando o C en el teclado
Espera, Â¿sigues leyendo esto? Debes amar realmente los diÃ¡logos... diÃ¡logos borrosos.
Los orcos hacen daÃ±o por contacto, yo intentarÃ­a mantenerme alejado de ellos.
Â¡Encuentra y combina power ups para dar variedad al gameplay!
Caminar en diagonal te da mÃ¡s velocidad, como en System Shook 2 o Thief.
Alt+F4 abre la consola de comandos
Buena suerte con el mal diseÃ±o ğŸ¥±
Â¿Es cosa mÃ­a, o ese Ã¡rbol se acaba de mover?
Bruh.
Los power ups son acumulables, asÃ­ que trata de recolectar tantos como puedas
Â¿Niveles oscuros? Brillas, hermano. Â¡Pero tic-tac, el reloj estÃ¡ corriendo! Intenta escapar usando el portal rojo. Aunque, hay una sorpresa
QuizÃ¡s no te lo creas pero si huyes, evitas la mayorÃ­a de las peleas con los enemigos, excepto por el daÃ±o por contacto.
Â¿Puedes creerlo? Alguien dijo que su racha mÃ¡s alta de asesinatos fue 666. Yo nunca he pasado de 100, bueno una vez, estaba borracha y en trance y lleguÃ© a poco mÃ¡s de 100.
Al principio, parece que la escopeta no se beneficia del power up de mÃ¡s daÃ±o, pero sÃ­ estÃ¡ teniendo efecto, solo espera.
Tengo poderes y pareces alguien que no sabe manejar armas, asÃ­ que cada vez que mueras, automÃ¡ticamente recibirÃ¡s algunas balas.

introductory_dialogues: To start the battle, enter in that hole over there.
Inside the dungeon, there are two portals.
A blue one to come back here and a red one to go to the next level and continue killing enemies.
rare_dialogues: Sometimes I wonder if the forest is alive.
Did you see that strange creature?
Blue = exit. Red = keep fighting.
Have you ever read the instructions at the bottom right of the screen?
El pepe.
Sometimes the bullets bounce off the orcs' gun... it has nothing to do with a problem with collisions or anything like that.
Have you ever wondered what lies beyond this forest?
Not every day do you find an adventurer in these lonely places.
They say there's an ancient spell hidden in these... Nah, I'm kidding. In this place, there are just portals. That's all.
The last fool who came here didn't know how to use the rocket launcher.
Never underestimate the power of a flower in the forest; it may hold more magic than you imagine.
This is a bad copy of any roguelite you have ever played.
I hope youâ€™re not expecting anything special here. The only thing you'll find is a waste of time.
A brave adventurer! Or just another dick who will end up dead, taken down by goblins deep in the dungeon
Sometimes, when the wind blows just right, you can hearâ€¦ absolutely nothing. The background sound should be improved!
Three weapons are enough!
Change weapons by pressing LB on the controller or C on the keyboard.
Wait, youâ€™re still reading this? You must really love dialogue... blur dialogues.
Orcs do contact damage, I would try to stay away from them.
Find and combine power ups to give variety to the gameplay!
Walking diagonally gives you more speed, as in System Shook 2 or Thief.
Alt+F4 open the command console
Good luck with the bad design ğŸ¥±
Is it just me, or did that tree just move?
Bruh.
The power ups are stackable, so try to collect as many as you can
Dark levels? You glow, bro. But tick-tock, the clock is ticking! Try to escape using the red portal. There's a surprise, though.
Maybe you don't fucking believe it but if you run away, you avoid most of the fight with the enemies, except for the contact damage.
Can you believe it, someone said his highest kill streak was 666. I've never gone over 100, well once, I was drunk and in a trance and got just over 100.
At first, it seems that the shotgun is not being benefited by the more damage power up, but it is having an effect, just wait.
I have powers and you look like someone who doesn't know how to handle guns, so every time you die, you'll automatically get a few bullets.
